alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 8:47AM MST until March 05 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to half an inch. Winds may gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Snake River Plain, Lower Snake River Plain, Bear Lake Valley, Blackfoot Mountains-Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands. This includes the cities of Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, St. Charles, Montpelier, Georgetown, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, Bone, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
